sn22.15:1.5: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn22.15:1.15: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn22.15:1.17: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
